title: Entrance Examination
description: The entrance examination for new students will be held on September 14th. Registration closes on September 10th at the school office.

title: Parents-Teachers Meeting
description: The termly Parents-Teachers Meeting will be held on April 15th. All parents are expected to attend to discuss their children's academic progress.

title: School Excursion
description: The annual school excursion to the Science Museum will take place on June 5th. Permission slips must be signed and returned by May 28th.
